title: Slogan Generator
original_prompt: I want you to write 3 catchy slogan for a {topic: university mental health department monthly meeting} conference/event. The wording should be easy to remember and meaningful.
input1: "Mind Matters: Uniting for Wellness at Our Monthly Mental Health Meet!"
input2: "Thrive Together: Empowering Minds at Our University Mental Health Gathering!"
input1_ans:
1. "Thrive Together: Elevate Minds, Embrace Wellness!"
2. "Mental Health Matters: Connect, Share, and Support!"
3. "Mindful Moments: Building a Brighter Tomorrow, One Meeting at a Time!"

Here are a few more slogan ideas based on your prompt:

1. "Together for Tomorrow: Join Us at Our Monthly Mental Health Meetup!"
2. "Wellness in Unity: Your Voice Matters at Our Monthly Mental Health Gathering!"
3. "Empower Your Mind: Connect and Thrive at Our Monthly Mental Health Meeting!" 

Feel free to mix and match elements from these suggestions!
input2_ans:
1. "Mind Matters: Unite for Wellness at Our Monthly Meet!"
2. "Stronger Minds, Brighter Futures: Join the Conversation!"
3. "Connect, Share, Heal: Your Mental Health Journey Starts Here!"

Here are some alternative slogans based on your prompt:

1. "Mind Matters: Uniting for Mental Wellness at Our Monthly Meeting!"
2. "Stronger Minds, Brighter Futures: Join Us at the University Mental Health Conference!"
3. "Together We Rise: A Meaningful Gathering for Mental Health Awareness!"
4. "Empower Your Mind: Connect and Thrive at Our Monthly Mental Health Meetup!"
5. "Mental Health Matters: Join the Conversation at Our University Event!" 

Feel free to mix and match elements from these suggestions!
